Welcome to the ERCIS App!
 This app informs you about the European Research Center for Information Systems (ERCIS), which is located in the German city MÃ¼nster. The ERCIS is an international network of scientists, conducting cooperative research in the field of Information Systems. 
 
 To navigate through the app, swipe in the main menu from the left or tap on the ERCIS home icon.
